text: @BorisJohnson Wasting billions on Brexit could have been used to do this! Earlier #Lockdown would have saved billions. #Covid19 decisions could have saved millions! APP 20 Million. Add all that up and the #Lies you spouting makes you a #UselessPM. Resign!
